review: Easy to set up and a great price for a great product !! Recommend to all

review: It is an ok device given the price. The lack of  wireless security standards is rather limiting though.

review: I love it I take to where ever I travel. I like beta version of displaying on big screen too.

review: A Great way to send pictures & videos from my Galaxy S5 to my large screen TV for a Great price

review: Excellent product. Nothing to complain about it.

review: I'm using three of them in different TVs, could cast 2 different Netflix movies at the same time. Eventually lost connection to my wifi network. Once in a while I had to reset it to proper working.
